subject: College Athletics
Decisions and Verdicts
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for a group of former college athletes have asked an appellate court to review its decision in the so-called O’Bannon case that upheld N.C.A.A. rules prohibiting payments to college athletes.
snippet: Lawyers for a group of former college athletes have asked an appellate court to review its decision in the so-called O’Bannon case that upheld N.C.A.A. rules prohibiting payments to college athletes.
